text: This is a list of seasons completed by the Liberty Flames football team of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Football Championship Subdivision (FBS). Liberty's first football team was fielded in 1973. Originally a NAIA team, Liberty moved to the NCAA's Division II in 1981, and then to Division I-AA in 1988. The Flames joined the Big South Conference in 2002, of which it has been a member since. ==Seasons== :Statistics correct as of the end of the 2018-19 college football season {| class="wikitable" |bgcolor="#FFE6BD"|NCAA Division I champions |bgcolor="#F2F5AC"|NCAA Division I FCS champions |bgcolor="#DDFFDD"|Conference Champions |bgcolor="#D0E7FF"|Division Champions |bgcolor="#96CDCD"|Bowl Eligible |bgcolor="#EBA4A4"|Undefeated Season |} {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" width=100% |- ! rowspan=2|Year ! rowspan=2|NCAA Division ! rowspan=2|Conference ! rowspan=2|Conference Division ! colspan="5"|Overall ! colspan="6"|Conference ! rowspan=2|Coach ! rowspan=2|Final Ranking |- !
